amendment.description: Amendment sought to clarify that nothing in the bill would prevent the FCC from requiring entities that must submit a public inspection file to do so in a machine-readable format which is easily sortable, searchable, and downloadable.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Yarmuth amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 231 (Roll no. 150).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Yarmuth amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 231 (Roll no. 150).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Yarmuth.
